name: Tales from the Dune: EXTINCTION
description:
*This is a short game that I made for my Final Major Project. 

As a wandering droid in a post apocalyptic desert world. your goal is to explore this deserted town to uncover what had happened after the great disaster. However, the decaying manner of this planet means that you will have to solve puzzles to find alternate routes to progress through the game.

Controls:

Interact - Z, X

Move - Arrow keys
